faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our template

questions.question: What technologies does this template use?
questions.answer: Our template is built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components. For authentication, we use Auth.js (formerly NextAuth.js), and the dashboard features various modern React patterns and best practices.

questions.question: Do I need to pay for updates?
questions.answer: No, once you purchase the template, you get free access to all future updates. We regularly improve the template with new features and security updates.

questions.question: Can I use this template for client projects?
questions.answer: Yes! You can use this template for both personal and client projects. Each purchase includes a license for one project.

questions.question: What kind of support do you provide?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive documentation, code examples, and community support through GitHub discussions. Pro and Enterprise plans include priority support with faster response times.

questions.question: Is it easy to customize the template?
questions.answer: Absolutely! The template is built with customization in mind. All components are well-documented and use Tailwind CSS for styling, making it easy to modify the look and feel to match your brand.
